availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jesse Henry Talbutt (Bourbon County, Kentucky, merchant and sheriff)

body.p: Bourbon County, Kentucky, merchant and sheriff. Bourbon County, Kentucky, native. Married Mary A. Holladay Talbutt in Nicholas County, Kentucky, on October 11, 1838. Father of Charles T. Talbutt, Charlotte B. Talbutt, Mary "Molly" A. Talbutt, John H. Talbutt, Jesse H. Talbutt, Ben E. Talbutt, Thomas H. Talbutt, Robert H. Talbutt, and S. B. Points Talbutt. Merchant in Nicholas County in 1850. Sheriff in Bourbon County in 1860. Owned nine enslaved persons in Bourbon County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, District 2, p. 437A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bourbon County, District 1, p. 521.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Bourbon County, Ruddles Mills, p. 444A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, District 2, p. 46A.
Birth and Death Records: Covington, Lexington, Louisville, and Newport (before 1911), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #7019184, Fayette County Deaths, p. 1827.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994051, Nichoals County Marriages.
"Jesse Henry Talbutt (1818-1880)," Find A Grave, Memorial #20152106, accessed August 25, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/20152106.
